statements: DELETE FROM targets WHERE id = 10 AND access_level = 'admin'
DELETE FROM targets WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND target_status = 'active'
DELETE FROM targets WHERE target_id = 1 AND access_level = 'admin';

DELETE FROM social_engineering WHERE technique_id IN (SELECT technique_id FROM social_engineering WHERE technique_name = 'Phishing');
